org.jetel.mapping

Class Mapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.mapping.Mapping
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<MappingAssignment>

    public class Mapping
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<MappingAssignment>
    This class is a container for mapping assignment.

        public Mapping subMapping(MappingFilter filter)
